channel.title: Making npcs hit higher *please help*****
channel.description: 317 delta How do I make my npcs hit higher and my players hit a bit lower, a lvl 108 npc is a fair fight against a lvl 27 player, thats not good haha. and if you have 1 defence they still only hit low like 3 - 6, so how do i make it so they hit like 15's and 20's and so my lvl 27 players cant hit 8's with like 20 str and att. I just want good high level training.

Okay but what do i look for and how do i change it?
